channel.title: CVE Feed for IBM -- WebSphere eXtreme Scale
channel.description: The latest CVEs for IBM -- WebSphere eXtreme Scale

item.title: CVE-2020-4336|2024-08-04T08:00:07.637Z -- ibm -- websphere%20extreme%20scale
item.description: IBM WebSphere eXtreme Scale 8.6.1 stores sensitive information in URL parameters. This may lead to information disclosure if unauthorized parties have access to the URLs via server logs, referrer header or browser history. IBM X-Force ID: 177932.

item.title: CVE-2019-4115|2024-08-04T19:26:27.963Z -- ibm -- websphere%20extreme%20scale
item.description: IBM WebSphere eXtreme Scale 8.6 Admin API is vulnerable to cross-site scripting. This vulnerability allows users to embed arbitrary JavaScript code in the Web UI thus altering the intended functionality potentially leading to credentials disclosure within a trusted session. IBM X-Force ID: 158113.

item.title: CVE-2019-4106|2024-08-04T19:26:27.987Z -- ibm -- websphere%20extreme%20scale
item.description: IBM WebSphere eXtreme Scale 8.6 Admin Console is vulnerable to cross-site scripting. This vulnerability allows users to embed arbitrary JavaScript code in the Web UI thus altering the intended functionality potentially leading to credentials disclosure within a trusted session. IBM X-Force ID: 158099.

item.title: CVE-2019-4109|2024-08-04T19:26:28.155Z -- ibm -- websphere%20extreme%20scale
item.description: IBM WebSphere eXtreme Scale 8.6 Admin Console could allow a remote attacker to hijack the clicking action of the victim. By persuading a victim to visit a malicious Web site, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to hijack the victim's click actions and possibly launch further attacks against the victim. IBM X-Force ID: 158102.

item.title: CVE-2019-4112|2024-08-04T19:26:27.965Z -- ibm -- websphere%20extreme%20scale
item.description: IBM WebSphere eXtreme Scale 8.6 Admin Console allows web pages to be stored locally which can be read by another user on the system. IBM X-Force ID: 158105.
